message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $110. We hope you find it worth considering!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm definitely interested in the product, but $110 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $80?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I'm glad to present you with an alternative offer at $95 for our product. This is a special deal considering its high value and benefits. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  $95 is closer, but I'm aiming for something around $85.

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $90. This is the best offer I can make, taking into account the current market conditions and the value you place on the product.
